These are the manual edits I needed to apply to the following files to get libc++ to build.

llvm_builds/lib/CMakeFiles/cxx_objects.dir/flags.make:
-----------------------------
# CMAKE generated file: DO NOT EDIT!
# Generated by "Unix Makefiles" Generator, CMake Version 3.5

# compile CXX with /usr/bin/clang++-5.0
CXX_FLAGS = -O0 -g -U__linux__  -U__unix__ -U__GLIBC__ -I/home/pat/projects/saturn/sysroot/system/include -Drestrict=__restrict -D_LIBCPP_HAS_NO_THREADS -std=c++17 -m32   -m32 -DLIBCXX_BUILDING_LIBCXXABI -nostdinc++ -nostdlib -nostdinc -ffreestanding -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -Wall -Wextra -W -Wwrite-strings -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-long-long -Werror=return-type -Wno-user-defined-literals -Wno-covered-switch-default -Wno-error -fno-exceptions -GR- -fno-rtti -fPIC -D_LIBCPP_BUILDING_LIBRARY -Wno-macro-redefined -Wno-ignored-attributes -Wno-unused-command-line-argument

CXX_DEFINES = -D_LIBCPP_USING_WIN32_RANDOM -D_SATURN_ -D_LIBCXX_USE_CLOCK_GETTIME -DCLOCK_REALTIME -D_LIBCPP_HAS_NO_MONOTONIC_CLOCK -U__GLIBC__ -DNDEBUG -D_LIBCPP_BUILDING_LIBRARY -D_LIBCPP_HAS_NO_PRAGMA_SYSTEM_HEADER -D_LIBCPP_NO_EXCEPTIONS -D_LIBCPP_NO_RTTI -D_LIBCPP_SUPPORT_WIN32_LOCALE_WIN32_H

CXX_INCLUDES = -I/home/pat/projects/saturn-ports/llvm_builds/include/c++build -I/home/pat/projects/saturn-ports/llvm/projects/libcxx/include -I/usr/lib/llvm-5.0/lib/clang/5.0.1/include 

-----------------------------

llvm_builds/lib/CMakeFiles/cxx_static.dir/flags.make:
-----------------------------

# CMAKE generated file: DO NOT EDIT!
# Generated by "Unix Makefiles" Generator, CMake Version 3.5

# compile CXX with /usr/bin/clang++-5.0
CXX_FLAGS = -v -O0 -g -U__linux__ -U__unix__ -U__GLIBC__ -I/home/pat/projects/saturn/sysroot/system/include -Drestrict=__restrict -D_LIBCPP_HAS_NO_THREADS -std=c++17 -m32  -D_LIBCPP_BUILDING_LIBRARY -D_LIBCPP_HAS_NO_ALIGNED_ALLOCATION -nostdinc++ -nostdlib -nostdinc -ffreestanding

CXX_DEFINES = -D_LIBCPP_USING_WIN32_RANDOM -D_SATURN_ -U__GLIBC__ -D_LIBCXX_USE_CLOCK_GETTIME -DCLOCK_REALTIME -D_LIBCPP_HAS_NO_MONOTONIC_CLOCK -DNDEBUG -D_LIBCPP_BUILDING_LIBRARY -D_LIBCPP_HAS_NO_PRAGMA_SYSTEM_HEADER -D_LIBCPP_NO_EXCEPTIONS -D_LIBCPP_NO_RTTI

CXX_INCLUDES = -I/home/pat/projects/saturn-ports/llvm_builds/include/c++build -I/home/pat/projects/saturn-ports/llvm/projects/libcxx/include -I/usr/lib/llvm-5.0/lib/clang/5.0.1/include

-----------------------------
